channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Governance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Governance

item.title: CVE-2023-33840|2024-09-11T14:31:53.854Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 256037.

item.title: CVE-2023-33837|2024-09-11T14:54:24.762Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0 does not encrypt sensitive or critical information before storage or transmission. IBM X-Force ID: 256020.

item.title: CVE-2022-22466|2024-09-11T14:41:51.016Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 225222.

item.title: CVE-2023-33839|2024-09-11T14:51:31.170Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 256036.

item.title: CVE-2023-35888|2024-03-20T13:25:12.617Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 258375.

item.title: CVE-2023-35888|2024-06-18T20:07:31.016Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 258375.

item.title: CVE-2023-35888|2024-08-02T16:37:39.908Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 258375.
